item.title: Interesting perspective
item.description:
Interesting perspective

One of the most typical pieces of advice you're likely to get for how to find a job that will bring you success and that you will find enjoyable and meaningful is to "follow your passion."

item.title: Joris Swinkels
item.description:
Joris Swinkels

Together with a team of trainers, coaches and ambassadors I wake up the World. We facilitate 4 day processes to guide people to a "new level of Consciousness". A clear purpose, meaning. It's described as coming home to one's Self. The next episode of leadership, entrepreneurship and world structures is knocking at the door, how long do you try to keep up the old structure? Or are you ready for the next level?

item.title: If your Company or your job has no purpose for this earth and its people other than financial, stop it, go do something else! Where do you choose to give your life to?
item.description: If your Company or your job has no purpose for this earth and its people other than financial, stop it, go do something else! Where do you choose to give your life to?

item.title: Reinventing Organizations
item.description:
Reinventing Organizations

A talk, followed by Q&A, by Frederic Laloux about "Reinventing Organizations", a research and book that is turning into an international phenomenon. Increasingly, employees and managers (but also doctors, nurses, teachers, etc.) are disillusioned with the way we run organizations today.

item.title: Reinventing Organizations
item.description:
Reinventing Organizations

Based on three years of research, the book Reinventing Organizations describes the emergence of a new management paradigm, a radically more soulful, purposeful and powerful ways to structure and run businesses and non-profits, schools and hospitals.

item.title: The Future of Management Is Teal
item.description:
The Future of Management Is Teal

A version of this article appeared in the Autumn 2015 issue of strategy+business. Illustration by Martin O'Neill Many people sense that the way organizations are run today has been stretched to its limits. In survey after survey, businesspeople make it clear that in their view, companies are places of dread and drudgery, not passion or purpose.

item.title: Creative Consciousness
item.description:
Creative Consciousness

the break trough methodology created by Marc Steinberg

item.title: Are you the word you give?
item.description:
Are you the word you give?

If you break your Word, you break your Power....Integrity of a structure is the 'wholeness' of the structure. If there is a hole in the structure the integrity is damaged. Same for the Word you give. Integrity of your Word means the 'wholeness' of the Word you give.

item.title: In jullie kracht?
item.description:
In jullie kracht?

1. Is jouw team betrokken en staan mensen in hun kracht? 2. Sluit leiderschap op alle lagen aan bij de behoefte? 3. Hoe staat het met jouw groei & ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden? Global Human Capital
